Package org.phantomapi.game

Full game api system

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Game
    Represents a game instance
    GameController
    Represents a controller of a game instance which consists of handlers
    GameEventBus
    Represents a game event bus for game events per game.
    GameEventListener
    Implement this to listen on game specific events
    GameHandler
    Represents a game handler which allows the game to function correctly
    GameObject
    Represents a game object
    GameObjectContainer
    Contains Game Objects
    GamePlugin
    Represents a game plugin
    GameState
    Represents a game state
    PlayerContainer
    Contains players
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseGameEvent
    Represents a base game event
    CapacityProfile
    Game capacity profile
    GameProfile
    A Game profile for handling basic game configurations
    PhantomGame
    Represents a phantom game instance implementation
    PhantomGameController
    Controls game handlers and manages the game event bus
    PhantomGameEventBus
    Represents an event bus
    PhantomGameHandler
    A Game handler
    PhantomGameObject
    Game objects for storing data
    PhantomGamePlugin
    Represents a game plugin
    PhantomGameState
    Represents a game state
    ResourcePackProfile
    Resource pack profiling
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CapacityMode
    Game Capacity mode
    GameStatus
    Represents a game status
    ResourcePackMode
    Resource pack mode for joining
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    GameEvent
    Represents a game event annotation to signal that this should listen on game events

Package org.phantomapi.game Description

Full game api system
